name: Space (Thief3)
description:
Game built for the Nokia 3310 Jam, mostly as an exercise in making a rust engine. Not that interesting. Shoot the asteroids to get points. Choppyness is deliberate (runs at 15fps.)

Just run the exe. Developed for 64bit Windows.

Controls:-

  • ESC - Close Window (doesn't work on splashscreen.)
  • Arrow Keys - to move.
  • Space - to shoot.

Source code(very much a mess currently): https://github.com/mkissarli/nokia3310

Web  hopefully coming soon.
